vsParam:
Jesus, I can't believe Korsh betrayed me.
Hahaha, didn't see that coming.

You bet! That's why I keep telling you
to beware of it... Humph.

Um... Excuse me, but I'm really curious...
Who on earth is Bill Berry?

? Oh, I didn't mention that yet.
I used to be Lord of Ateria.

Yeah, and I was his subordinate.
Bill Berry was very intimidating?

Oh, right.
Who the heck are you people?

Oh, let's introduce ourselves from...
Um, we are...

Oh, you're students from the Academy. You must've
been exhausted as you came such a long way here.

... Hey, father.
I need you to do me a favor.
What is it? Tell me about it.

It's Sorel's “student ID card"...
Can you give it back to her!?

I know this "student ID card" is worth
a lot of money! Because it's like Crystal.

But the "student ID card" means a lot to Sorel.
So... So!

What are you talking about?
A student ID card is worth a lot of money? Like Crystal?

Hey, a student ID card is like any other ID card!
Not worth a lot of money, OK?

Ahhhhhhh!?
Is... Is it true!? Hey, are you serious?!

Yeah, so...
Here it is, back to you, Lady.

Wonderful! Yay~ My precious student ID card!
Thank you, Varerian!

No no, I don't deserve your thanks.
I stole it from you.

And... Shoot!
I misunderstood its value, so humiliating...

Even so, you interceded for us, didn't you?
Anyway, I'm so glad.

Right, Scalcap. [px] is an alchemist.
They helped us, so in return... Give them that.

Yeah, you're right. Let me see... Where did I put it...
Here it is. Take it.

... A book?
It is... the skill book of "Alchemy of Earth"?

I totally forgot it.
But it's exactly why we came to Ateria...
So it's kind of a blessing in disguise to some extent?

Hehe, yeah.
We got what we want in spite of all the trouble.

Guys, sorry for causing you so much trouble.
Just take it.

Anyhow, Ateria is a good place. Come for fun anytime.
The whole Dardala Company will be here expecting you.
What do you mean by expecting us?

... Guys. I'll repay you for this favor.
So stay safe wherever you are before that.

Yeah, got it.
See you, Barcarian.

... It's Varerian, darn!
... Sigh, never mind. Take care.
